MAP.COMMENT: --Extract published data,get payload size, date pattern---

BRANCH.COMMENT: --Check if the message size is less then configured value--

EXIT.NAME: $default
EXIT.FAILURE-MESSAGE: Payload size is %sizeInMB% which is greater than %payloadSize% so the message is discarded.

Values.value: Error occured while storeing the paylod into PyloadVault with TrackingID: %PublishPayload/trackingId% and TransactionId : %PublishPayload/transactionId%, Error : %lastError/error%.
